tool.name: Convert Genbank to FASTA

param.name: input1
param.label: Genbank dataset
param.help: Genbank dataset to be converted to FASTA. This dataset can be gzipped.

param.name: remove_version
param.label: Remove sequence version label?
param.help: Genbank sequences have vesion numbers such as B000564.2. This option removes them leaving only B000564

tool.help:
**What it does?**
This tool converts Genbank datasets into Fasta datasets. It takes Genbank as the input and produces a single output in Fasta format. If Genbank dataset contains multiple sequences it produces a single Fasta dataset with multiple sequecnes in it.
This tool has a single option `--remove_version`. If selected is will remove version number from the accession number. For example::
LC129268.1
will be converted to::
LC129268
This is useful when working with snpEff.
